objects.text:
100+ Hours Wireless Playtime
Marshall Signature Sound
Customizable M-Button
Rugged Foldable Design

product_details.description: True icons never die; they just get better with time. Major V is no different. From its explosive Marshall signature sound to its everlasting design, every detail of these headphones has been painstakingly considered and refined. Featuring 100+ hours of wireless playtime combined with a rugged and foldable design, Major V is best paired with your next great adventure. MARSHALL SIGNATURE SOUND: Thunderous bass, smooth mids and crisp treble. Major V delivers the Marshall signature sound you know and love. 100+ HOURS OF WIRELESS PLAYTIME: Your next adventure awaits, and Major V is in for the ride. Packing 100+ hours of wireless playtime, you can be gone for days. RUGGED AND FOLDABLE DESIGN: Rugged so that it lasts. Foldable for compact storage. Major is an instant classic for the fifth time running. CUSTOMISABLE M-BUTTON: Instantly access the Spotify Tap default function or your EQ settings or voice assistant thanks to Major V’s M-button and the Marshall Bluetooth app WIRELESS CHARGING: We don’t like wires either, they just get in the way. Thanks to wireless charging, it’s simple to give Major V a boost when needed. Brand - Marshall ** Color - Black ** Ear Placement - On Ear ** Form Factor - On Ear ** Noise Control - None **

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek, premium design intended to promote a modern audio product. It utilizes a minimalistic yet dynamic layout that combines clean typographic hierarchy with striking contrast. The heading (`heading`) in bold, sans-serif capital letters, is placed prominently at the top in gold. Below it, a subheading (`subheading`) and a tagline (`tagline`) provide supporting product identification in crisp white. A list (`description`) of four key features follows a subtle golden line (`decorative`), enhancing visual segmentation. A price tag (`price`) is displayed boldly near the bottom to attract attention, with a gold call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled via `cta`. A large image of the product (`product_image`) is placed to the right to balance the composition while showcasing the item.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: `#000000` (primary background)
- Charcoal Gray: `#111111`, `#222222`, `#333333` (gradient background and strokes)
- Gold: `#D4AF37` (accents, price, heading, decorative line, and button)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (subheading, tagline, description)
product_color: The product image of the Marshall headphones utilizes a sleek and refined color palette dominated by matte black (#1C1C1C) and textured charcoal black (#2E2E2E), giving it a premium, rugged feel. Accents like the metallic gold (#C9A743) button and the white Marshall logo (#FFFFFF) offer high contrast, drawing attention without overwhelming the aesthetic. The textures – from the grainy earcups to the smooth headband – help the colors subtly shift under light, enhancing depth. This monochrome base with strategic highlights creates an ideal minimalist yet bold look. Suggested palette: Matte Black (#1C1C1C), Charcoal Black (#2E2E2E), Gold Accent (#C9A743), Pure White (#FFFFFF).
